Chill out, guys. It's obvious he wants a tribute, to honor the deceased crew and remind people of the awful disaster. He's being anything but disrespectful, and I approve of his decision.

It seems the ones who can do it "good" are people like Nassault, who really understand what they're doing and know 100% how to deal events like these. I myself would refrain from making such a video.
